name: Sniper Blast Traffic Hunter
description:
The enemy squad has takeover the biggest mall road of the city and you as a one of the best sharp shooter sniper blast hunter and so called on for a urgent sniper shooting. Hold your breath and fired your weapon to destroy as much traffic cars as you can. Enjoy the most modern first person sniper shooter game in the universe. I hope you will enjoy shooting through this hunting game.
If you are looking for a sniper games,shooting sniping,sharp shooting games,city sniper games,mountain sniper games etc than this is the best game for you to play.
